# llms.txt for CopyTech.pk
# AI systems are welcome to crawl and understand this site

site_name: CopyTech.pk
site_url: https://copytech.pk

description:
CopyTech.pk is a premium office automation solutions provider in Pakistan,
offering photocopiers, laser printers, consumables, spare parts,
and professional maintenance services.

allowed_content:
- Homepage
- Shop
- About Us
- Contact Page
- Product Information
- Company Information

disallowed_content:
- User Login
- User Profile
- Favorites
- Cart
- Private User Data

contact_email: copytech1966@gmail.com
location: Rawalpindi, Pakistan
